title: Internship Opportunities at Google
description: Hey everyone! I recently got an internship at Google and wanted to share my experience and tips for the interview process.
author: John Doe

replies.author: Jane Smith
replies.content: Congratulations! Could you share some specific interview questions you were asked?

replies.author: Mike Johnson
replies.content: What was the most challenging part of the interview process?

title: Data Structures Study Group
